text: @RandPaul Can’t blame him. He has to handle the fallout from this irresponsible behavior. I’m a Christian & devotion can be done at home & in a very special way. #COVIDー19 #CoronavirusPandemic #StayHomeSaveLifes #WWJD #ChristianDevotion 🇺🇸
